info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 5:23PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Snow showers will impact much of Southwest Montana through midnight tonight... Snow shower activity is increasing across southwest Montana this evening will is expected to persist through midnight tonight before diminishing thereafter. Snowfall accumulations will generally range from trace amounts to a couple of inches, with amounts in the 2 to 5 inch range over the Madison and Gallatin ranges. Travelers should be prepared for highly variable road conditions including visibility reductions down to a half mile at times and slippery roads, especially over mountain passes. Use caution and slow down if traveling.
